biotools.summary:
An open-source computational platform for the analysis of sequencing data for rare genetic diseases.

Anfisa is a Variant Analysis and Curation Tool. Its purpose is to bring together Genetic Research and Clinical settings and provide a medical geneticist with access to research Genome.

bioschemas.name: AnFiSA
